This vignette introduces the `schools` dataset included in the `{bruneimap}` package, which provides spatial data for schools across Brunei. 
The dataset includes essential information such as the name, geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude), and district of each school.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(bruneimap)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
glimpse(schools)
```
